scale_info.name: Perceived Artificial Intelligence Literacy Questionnaire (PAILQ-6)
scale_info.source: Grassini, S. (2024). A Psychometric Validation of the PAILQ-6. Nordic Conference on Human-Computer Interaction.
scale_info.instructions: Please rate each statement based on your beliefs and feelings from 1 (strongly disagree) to 7 (strongly agree). There are no right or wrong answers.
scale_info.scoring_notes: PAILQ-6: Average of all responses. Factor 1 (Awareness Literacy): Avg of 1, 3, 5. Factor 2 (Engagement Literacy): Avg of 2, 4, 6.

pailq6_1.text: I understand the basic concepts of artificial intelligence.

pailq6_2.text: I believe I can contribute to AI projects.

pailq6_3.text: I can judge the pros and cons of AI.

pailq6_4.text: I keep up with the latest AI trends.

pailq6_5.text: I'm comfortable talking about AI with others.

pailq6_6.text: I can think of new ways to use existing AI tools.
